title: Do you get susspended if you have your account in-active for a year or two?
body:
Hey Riot 

Question

Since this is the only board sub section you mostly reply i want to get an answer on this 

Since my computer broke and i wont be having another one for a quite a while 

Will my account get susspended or banned from been in-active for a year or two ??

Am planning on fixing my life and getting to college so i wont be having any time playing the game as much as i used to so 

Do i have to worry about my account getting banned or susspended due to inactivity or not??

replies.body: Your account will remain exactly as you leave it, with the exception of your ranked due to decay and following season.  Do what you got to do, and League will be here when you get back!  :D  Keep in mind though, that your name may be released for inactivity after 2 and a half years, per the [summoner name clean up!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-)  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=j9Ez7yr3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-11T21:32:05.184+0000)
>
> Your account will remain exactly as you leave it, with the exception of your ranked due to decay and following season.  Do what you got to do, and League will be here when you get back!

Nice

Thats all i needed to know 

Let me clarify tho 

I will be playing the game again thats for SURE BUT not for a long while ( year or more )

Also will the masteries i have on the champs stay or will they get removed too as well from my inactivity?

Btw do i need to send a support ticket to let you guys "offically" know about this or its okay through here?

I feel like you'll be fine, though specifically on this-

>Also will the masteries i have on the champs stay or will they get removed too as well from my inactivity?

Masteries get **entirely** overhauled about once a season, so I think the answer is yes, you'll have to rebuild your mastery sets, cause everyone's masteries get reset whenever they overhaul masteries (you'll still be lvl 30 though).

Edit: Oh, mastery points, whoops. Yeah I see no reason you'd lose those.
